title: FS - T206 Carl Lundgren P350 - SGC 4.5 (good sized price reduction).
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Carl Lundgren P350 - SGC 4.5 (good sized price reduction).
posts.post_content: For Sale (Reduced)  - T206 Carl Lundgren with Piedmont 350 reverse that has been graded SGC 4.5    $330 via pp gs or $320 via venmo.  Thanks for looking, please message if interested.  This listing will be cross posted.  Bob Intrieri.
